name: Huchuy Qosqo And Machu Picchu Trek 2 Days / 1 Nights
description: This tour is filled with activities and is perfect for those who want to see the best of the Sacred Valley before taking a train to visit the world famous Machu Picchu. This tour is not as difficult as many of the other treks to Machu Picchu, we will only walk for 10 km in total. This combination makes this tour perfect for families with children or travellers on a tight time schedule.
